Articles.Content:
I don't know how other people feel about this but I simply cannot get over all those little pieces of fairing that scatter everywhere when you jettison a stock fairing. I think that fairings should only separate into 2 neat pieces, does anybody else think this too?

Leave a post with your thoughts on this topic.

Can't say I am concerned too much about purely visual KSP issues, when there are still many functional issues remain...

Especially for visual things which visible like for couple seconds most (and even then already fixed by mods).

Edited October 7, 2015 by RidingTheFlow
You you seriously planning to have this discussion AGAIN? Get over it! Mod it, clam it and play on. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124031
Honestly, I don't care. It's a meaningless animation that you are seeing for a second or so.

My thoughts are that the community has had enough of this particular topic, please use the addon above if you would like different fairing behavior.

Closing!
